Reviews.Author: Mommybe
Reviews.Content: I have bought many different tier two brand tablets for my family and I like this one for the awesome battery life and flash of the back camera. I got this for my brother's birthday. He uses this tablet to check his emails and playing games from Google play. He downloaded printer app from Google play to print his emails as well and it works fine.
Reviews.Title: Awesome battery life

ProductInfo.Features:
CHIP: DUAL CORE CORTEX A7 1.2 GHZ
AndroidTM 4.2 Jelly Bean
STORAGE: 4GB
WIRELESS AND CELLULAR: WI-FI (802.11 B/G/N)
DUAL CAMERA, PHOTOS, AND VIDEO RECORDING
ProductInfo.Name: AXESS TA2510-7BK 7-Inch Dual Core GOOGLE PLAY Tablet (A20 Cortex A7 CPU) with Android 4.2 Jelly Bean , 4 GB Storage with Micro SD Card Slot up to 32 GB, 512 MB RAM, G Sensor, HDMI Output, WiFi, Built-in Dual Camera and Speaker in Black Color.
